item.title: Old About Us
item.dc:creator: agamez
item.content:encoded:
About MAXX Energy

Leading the future of sustainable energy with cutting-edge solar solutions and intelligent data insights.

Our Mission

MAXX Energy is committed to accelerating the world's transition to sustainable energy through innovative solar technology and comprehensive data analytics. We believe that clean, renewable energy should be accessible, reliable, and economically viable for everyone.

What We Do

We specialize in solar plant development, operation, and optimization. Our Enterprise Data Access Portal provides stakeholders with real-time insights into plant performance, enabling data-driven decision making and maximizing energy output.

¬†¬†

¬†

¬†

¬†

Our Core Values

Sustainability

We're committed to environmental stewardship and reducing carbon footprints through renewable energy solutions.

Innovation

Continuously pushing the boundaries of solar technology and data analytics to improve efficiency and performance.

Reliability

Delivering consistent, high-quality energy solutions that our customers can depend on, day after day.

Leadership Team

¬† ¬†Sarah Johnson

Chief Executive Officer

Leading MAXX Energy's strategic vision with over 15 years of experience in renewable energy and sustainable business practices.

¬† Michael Chen

Chief Technology Officer

Driving technological innovation and overseeing our data analytics platform development and solar plant optimization systems.

¬†Dr. Emily Rodriguez

Head of Operations

Managing day-to-day operations and ensuring optimal performance across all our solar plant facilities.

Get in Touch

Interested in learning more about MAXX Energy or our solar solutions? We'd love to hear from you.

Email: info@maxxenergy.comPhone: +1 (555) 123-4567Location: 123 Solar Way, Green City, ST 12345¬†

¬© 2025 MAXX Energy. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: agamez
item.content:encoded:
Privacy Policy

Effective Date: July 28, 2025

MAXX Energy (‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúour,‚Äù ‚Äúus‚Äù) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website MAXX Energy and use our services.

1. Information We Collect

  • Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and other details you provide when contacting us.

  • Non-Personal Information: Browser type, IP address, pages visited, and general usage data collected automatically.

2. How We Use Information

We may use your information to:

  • Provide and improve our services

  • Respond to inquiries or customer support requests

  • Send updates, newsletters, or promotional materials (you can opt out anytime)

  • Comply with legal obligations

3. Sharing of Information

We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share it with:

  • Trusted third-party service providers assisting with operations

  • Authorities if required by law

4. Cookies & Tracking

Our site may use cookies to improve user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

5. Data Security

We implement reasonable measures to protect your information. However, no system is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

6. Your Rights

You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal information by contacting us at info@maxxenergy.com.

7. Updates

We may update this policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with a new effective date.

8. Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

¬†info@maxxenergy.com
¬†407-509-3646

item.title: Terms of Use
item.dc:creator: agamez
item.content:encoded:
Terms of Use

Effective Date: July 28, 2025

Welcome to MAXX Energy. By accessing or using our website MAXX Energy, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. Please read them carefully.

1. Use of Website

  • You agree to use this site only for lawful purposes.

  • You must not attempt to disrupt, damage, or gain unauthorized access to the site or its systems.

2. Intellectual Property

All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of MAXX Energy or its licensors. You may not copy, distribute, or use it without permission.

3. Third-Party Links

Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the content or practices of those sites.

4. No Warranties

The website and its content are provided ‚Äúas is‚Äù without warranties of any kind. MAXX Energy disclaims all liability for damages resulting from use of the site.

5. Limitation of Liability

MAXX Energy shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of this website.

6. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless MAXX Energy from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the site.

7. Governing Law

These Terms are governed by the laws of Virginia, USA.

8. Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use of the site after changes means you accept the updated Terms.

9. Contact Us

If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
info@maxxenergy.com
407-509-3646

item.title: Newsroom
item.dc:creator: agamez
item.content:encoded:
The Newsroom

MAXX Energy CEO to Speak at Global Energy Summit 2025

MAXX Energy CEO Sarah Johnson will deliver a keynote address on digital transformation in energy at the Global Energy Summit 2025 in New York City, joining leaders, innovators, and policymakers from across the globe in charting the future of sustainable power.

Read more
September 15, 2025

MAXX Energy Launches Employee Volunteer Day Initiative

MAXX Energy has introduced a new Employee Volunteer Day Initiative, giving every staff member one fully paid day each year to contribute to community projects, reinforcing the company‚Äôs mission of service and sustainability.

Read more
September 10, 2025

MAXX Energy Achieves 40% Reduction in Operational Carbon Footprint

Through fleet electrification, renewable energy procurement, and data-driven efficiency upgrades, MAXX Energy has reduced its operational carbon footprint by 40% compared to 2022 levels, marking a major step toward its 2035 net zero target.

Read more
August 25, 2025

MAXX Energy Featured in Tech Innovators Magazine

Tech Innovators Magazine has spotlighted MAXX Energy as a leading force in the renewable energy sector, highlighting its data-driven solutions, community-focused programs, and strong commitment to digital accessibility and innovation.

Read more
June 02, 2025

MAXX Energy Recognized for Sustainability by GreenTech Awards 2025

MAXX Energy has received the GreenTech Award 2025 for its innovative sustainability programs, including smart energy efficiency initiatives and community-based solar projects.

Read more
May 05, 2025

MAXX Energy Opens Applications for Fall 2025 Internship Program

MAXX Energy is now accepting applications for its Fall 2025 internship program, offering students and recent graduates hands-on experience in engineering, data, product, and community programs.

Read more

The Newsroom

[elementor-element k="7b09cf16618d68e7b0fd2a44640675a5" data=""]
September 15, 2025

MAXX Energy Launches Employee Volunteer Day Initiative

MAXX Energy has introduced a new Employee Volunteer Day Initiative, giving every staff member one fully paid day each year to contribute to community projects, reinforcing the company’s mission of service and sustainability.

Read more
September 10, 2025

MAXX Energy Achieves 40% Reduction in Operational Carbon Footprint

Through fleet electrification, renewable energy procurement, and data-driven efficiency upgrades, MAXX Energy has reduced its operational carbon footprint by 40% compared to 2022 levels, marking a major step toward its 2035 net zero target.

Read more
August 25, 2025

MAXX Energy Featured in Tech Innovators Magazine

Tech Innovators Magazine has spotlighted MAXX Energy as a leading force in the renewable energy sector, highlighting its data-driven solutions, community-focused programs, and strong commitment to digital accessibility and innovation.

Read more
June 02, 2025

MAXX Energy Recognized for Sustainability by GreenTech Awards 2025

MAXX Energy has received the GreenTech Award 2025 for its innovative sustainability programs, including smart energy efficiency initiatives and community-based solar projects.

Read more
May 05, 2025

MAXX Energy Opens Applications for Fall 2025 Internship Program

MAXX Energy is now accepting applications for its Fall 2025 internship program, offering students and recent graduates hands-on experience in engineering, data, product, and community programs.

Read more

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: agamez
item.content:encoded:
Driving the Future of Energy

At MAXX Energy, we lead the future of sustainable energy with cutting-edge solar solutions and intelligent data insights. Our mission is to accelerate the world‚Äôs transition to clean, renewable energy through innovative solar technology and comprehensive data analytics. We believe sustainable energy should be accessible, reliable, and economically viable for all, and we work to maximize the performance and long-term value of every system we deliver.

What We Do

We design and deliver safe, efficient distributed energy systems including solar PV, solar thermal, and energy storage. Beyond installation, we provide ongoing expertise and system support to ensure optimal performance and long-term value. We also specialize in solar plant development, operation, and optimization. Through our Enterprise Data Access Portal, stakeholders gain real-time insights into plant performance, enabling smarter decision making and maximizing energy output.

¬†

Our Core Values

Above all, our company values sustainability, innovation & excellent customer services. You can trust us to bring you the best in the business.

Sustainability

We‚Äôre committed to environmental stewardship and reducing carbon footprints through renewable energy solutions.

Innovation

Continuously pushing the boundaries of solar technology and data analytics to improve efficiency and performance.

Reliability

Delivering consistent, high-quality energy solutions that our customers can depend on, day after day.

Team Of Experts

Our team is working everyday to build a better world & help ensure you get the best services

Michael Chen

Chief Technology Officer

Driving technological innovation and overseeing our data analytics platform development and solar plant optimization systems.

Sarah Johnson

Chief Executive Officer

Leading MAXX Energy‚Äôs strategic vision with over 15 years of experience in renewable energy and sustainable business practices.

Dr. Emily Rodriguez

Head of Operations

Managing day-to-day operations and ensuring optimal performance across all our solar plant facilities.

{"timeout":1759701833,"value":{"content":"

Driving the Future of Energy

[elementor-element k="7b09cf16618d68e7b0fd2a44640675a5" data=""]

What We Do

[elementor-element k="7b09cf16618d68e7b0fd2a44640675a5" data=""]

Our Core Values

[elementor-element k="7b09cf16618d68e7b0fd2a44640675a5" data=""]

Sustainability

We’re committed to environmental stewardship and reducing carbon footprints through renewable energy solutions.

Innovation

Continuously pushing the boundaries of solar technology and data analytics to improve efficiency and performance.

Reliability

Delivering consistent, high-quality energy solutions that our customers can depend on, day after day.

Team Of Experts

[elementor-element k="7b09cf16618d68e7b0fd2a44640675a5" data=""]

Michael Chen

Chief Technology Officer

Driving technological innovation and overseeing our data analytics platform development and solar plant optimization systems.

Sarah Johnson

Chief Executive Officer

Leading MAXX Energy’s strategic vision with over 15 years of experience in renewable energy and sustainable business practices.

Dr. Emily Rodriguez

Head of Operations

Managing day-to-day operations and ensuring optimal performance across all our solar plant facilities.

item.title: Leadership
item.dc:creator: agamez
item.content:encoded:
MAXX Energy CEO to Speak at Global Energy Summit 2025

Alondra Gamez

September 30, 2025

MAXX Energy is proud to announce that CEO Sarah Johnson has been invited to speak at the prestigious Global Energy Summit 2025, set to take place in New York City from September 22‚Äì24. The summit gathers global leaders, policymakers, investors, and innovators to discuss the challenges and opportunities of the energy transition.

Johnson‚Äôs keynote address, ‚ÄúDigital Transformation in Energy: Balancing Innovation and Equity,‚Äù will explore how renewable technologies, data analytics, and artificial intelligence are reshaping the energy sector. She will also share MAXX Energy‚Äôs own strategies for expanding access to clean energy while ensuring affordability and equity for underserved communities.

In addition to her keynote, Johnson will participate in a panel discussion on Women in Energy Leadership, where she will join executives from across the industry to discuss diversity, inclusion, and the future workforce of energy.

The Global Energy Summit 2025 is expected to host over 3,000 attendees, including representatives from the United Nations, leading energy firms, startups, and research institutions. MAXX Energy‚Äôs presence reflects the company‚Äôs growing influence as both a technology leader and a sustainability advocate.

‚ÄúDigital innovation is a powerful driver of sustainability, but its benefits must be shared by everyone,‚Äù Johnson said. ‚ÄúAt MAXX Energy, we are building tools and programs that make renewable power accessible, reliable, and economically viable for all households.‚Äù

item.title: Community Impact
item.dc:creator: agamez
item.content:encoded:
MAXX Energy Launches Employee Volunteer Day Initiative

Alondra Gamez

September 15, 2025

MAXX Energy has officially launched its Employee Volunteer Day Initiative;¬†a new program designed to encourage community involvement and create meaningful impact beyond the workplace. Every employee will now receive one fully paid day per year to volunteer at local nonprofits, schools, food banks, and environmental organizations.

The initiative reflects MAXX Energy‚Äôs broader commitment to social responsibility and environmental stewardship. Employees may participate in group activities organized by the company or choose individual opportunities that align with their personal passions.

The first round of volunteer opportunities, scheduled for this fall, includes tree planting in local parks, supporting local food banks, mentoring students in STEM fields, and helping with neighborhood clean-up events. MAXX Energy will also track collective employee volunteer hours and share impact stories on the company‚Äôs website.

By investing in employee-driven service, MAXX Energy hopes to inspire other companies in the clean energy sector to adopt similar initiatives. ‚ÄúOur responsibility extends beyond providing renewable energy,‚Äù Torres added. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs about being good neighbors and active participants in the communities we serve.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis program reflects our belief that giving back is part of who we are as a company,‚Äù said HR Director Elena Torres. ‚ÄúWe want our team members to feel empowered to contribute to causes they care about, and to strengthen the communities that support us.‚Äù

Share This Article

MAXX Energy has officially launched its Employee Volunteer Day Initiative;\u00a0a new program designed to encourage community involvement and create meaningful impact beyond the workplace. Every employee will now receive one fully paid day per year to volunteer at local nonprofits, schools, food banks, and environmental organizations.<\/p>

The initiative reflects MAXX Energy\u2019s broader commitment to social responsibility and environmental stewardship. Employees may participate in group activities organized by the company or choose individual opportunities that align with their personal passions.<\/p>

The first round of volunteer opportunities, scheduled for this fall, includes tree planting in local parks, supporting local food banks, mentoring students in STEM fields, and helping with neighborhood clean-up events. MAXX Energy will also track collective employee volunteer hours and share impact stories on the company\u2019s website.<\/p>

By investing in employee-driven service, MAXX Energy hopes to inspire other companies in the clean energy sector to adopt similar initiatives. \u201cOur responsibility extends beyond providing renewable energy,\u201d Torres added. \u201cIt\u2019s about being good neighbors and active participants in the communities we serve.\u201d<\/p>","text_color":"#535B6E","_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"15","left":"0","isLinked":false},"eael_tooltip_section_content":"I am a tooltip","eael_ext_content_protection_password_placeholder":"Enter Password","eael_ext_content_protection_password_submit_btn_txt":"Submit","eael_ext_content_protection_password_incorrect_message":"Password does not match.","eael_cl_logics":[{"_id":"2c9d42e"}],"__globals__":{"typography_typography":""},"typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Syne","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":20,"sizes":[]},"_animation":"fadeInUp","_animation_delay":200},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"753a5eb0","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

item.title: Sustainability
item.dc:creator: agamez
item.content:encoded:
MAXX Energy Achieves 40% Reduction in Operational Carbon Footprint

Alondra Gamez

September 10, 2025

MAXX Energy today announced a 40% reduction in its operational carbon footprint compared to 2022, underscoring the company‚Äôs commitment to sustainability and climate action.

The achievement is the result of several initiatives, including:

  • Transitioning more than 60% of the company‚Äôs fleet vehicles to electric.

  • Expanding renewable energy procurement across offices and facilities.

  • Upgrading data centers with advanced cooling systems and AI-based energy management.

  • Implementing stricter waste reduction and recycling programs across sites.

The announcement follows the release of MAXX Energy‚Äôs Annual Sustainability Report, which outlines the company‚Äôs environmental, social, and governance (ESG) performance. The report also highlights community solar projects, employee volunteer initiatives, and educational outreach programs as part of its broader sustainability agenda.

MAXX Energy plans to continue publishing progress annually to ensure transparency and accountability.

‚ÄúThis milestone is a reflection of our team‚Äôs dedication to building a greener future,‚Äù said Sustainability Officer Jasmine Lee. ‚ÄúWhile 40% is an incredible achievement, we see this as a steppingstone. Our ultimate goal is achieving net zero operations by 2035.‚Äù

Share This Article

item.title: Media Recognition
item.dc:creator: agamez
item.content:encoded:
MAXX Energy Featured in Tech Innovators Magazine

Alondra Gamez

August 25, 2025

MAXX Energy has been featured in the September issue of Tech Innovators Magazine, recognized as one of the top companies driving change in the energy industry. The article praises MAXX‚Äôs data-first approach to renewable energy, its accessible technology platforms, and its leadership in community engagement.

The feature covers MAXX Energy‚Äôs Accessibility Ally initiative, its community solar pilot programs, and its use of real-time analytics through the Enterprise Data Access Portal. The magazine also highlights MAXX‚Äôs focus on diversity and inclusion, crediting the company for developing programs that reflect the needs of a wide customer base.

Tech Innovators Magazine is a widely respected publication that profiles groundbreaking companies across industries, with a readership of over 500,000 professionals worldwide. MAXX Energy‚Äôs inclusion signals its rising influence not just as an energy provider, but as a technology innovator.

‚ÄúWe‚Äôre honored to be recognized in Tech Innovators Magazine,‚Äù said CEO Sarah Johnson. ‚ÄúThis recognition validates the hard work of our teams, who are committed to making clean energy smarter, fairer, and more accessible.‚Äù

Share This Article

Facebook-f Twitter Linkedin-in

item.title: Awards
item.dc:creator: agamez
item.content:encoded:
MAXX Energy Recognized for Sustainability by GreenTech Awards 2025

Alondra Gamez

June 02, 2025

MAXX Energy has been honored with the GreenTech Award 2025, an international recognition of companies that demonstrate leadership in advancing environmental responsibility and innovation.

The award specifically cited MAXX‚Äôs smart thermostat rebate program, its community solar pilots in Dallas, and its work in digital accessibility as standout initiatives. Collectively, these programs have helped households save on costs, reduce energy use, and expand access to renewable power.

The GreenTech Awards are judged by a panel of experts from the renewable energy, technology, and environmental policy fields. MAXX Energy‚Äôs recognition positions it among global leaders working toward a carbon-neutral world.

Looking ahead, the company plans to expand its award-winning efficiency programs into additional states, with a goal of reducing household emissions by 25% over the next five years.

‚ÄúThis award is a testament to the power of collaboration,‚Äù said Sustainability Lead Priya Nair. ‚ÄúOur employees, our partners, and our customers are all part of this journey toward a cleaner and more sustainable future.‚Äù

item.title: Careers
item.dc:creator: agamez
item.content:encoded:
MAXX Energy Opens Applications for Fall 2025 Internship Program

Alondra Gamez

May 05, 2025

MAXX Energy has opened applications for its Fall 2025 Internship Program, inviting students and early-career professionals to join the company for a 12-week immersive experience.

Interns will be placed in departments including engineering, product development, data analytics, marketing, and community outreach, working side by side with industry professionals. The program emphasizes mentorship, career growth, and the opportunity to contribute to real projects that drive MAXX Energy‚Äôs mission forward.

Selected interns will receive a competitive stipend, access to training resources, and opportunities for networking across the company. Remote and hybrid options are available to ensure flexibility.

Applications close on June 15, 2025. Interested candidates are encouraged to apply early, as spots are limited.

‚ÄúOur interns are not observers ‚Äî they are contributors,‚Äù said Talent Manager Ana Rodriguez. ‚ÄúEvery year, we see our interns deliver valuable insights and solutions that strengthen our work. This program is about building the next generation of leaders in clean energy.‚Äù

Share This Article

Facebook-f Twitter Linkedin-in
